title: Belkin Anti-Smudge Screen Protectors for iPhone 5 and 5S (2 Pack)
description: Protection Without Distraction The totally transparent overlay keeps your screen safe without changing its appearance. Defend Your Device Avoid damage without affecting your touchscreen’s functionality. Strong yet thin and lightweight, the overlay provides excellent protection that will help keep your device looking like new.Anti-SmudgeProtect from finger smudges.TruClearSee your screen, not the overlay. TruClear technology ensures optimal screen visibility. Fast Install Applying the overlay is fast and easy. Simply clean your Alpha screen with the included cleaning wipe, peel the overlay from its backing and place it onto your screen. Then use the included smoothing card to push away creases and bubbles.
